about_the_game:
Chaos Magus blends physics based spellcasting with dynamic sword fighting in VR.

Unleash the might of a powerful wizard and let unparalleled magic surge through your fingertips! Dive deep into a world threatened by primal elementals. Save the people of these lands and master over 200 mesmerizing spells. Tackle 100+ formidable foes and fearsome bosses. Use your creativity and obliterate all who oppose you. Step into an epic journey and create your own legendary tale. Are you prepared for the ultimate magical saga?

Key Features:
- Deep Magic System: We've developed a unique magic system that empowers players to craft 200 spells in real-time, providing a hands-on sorcery experience that's both intuitive and deeply satisfying.

- Dynamic Combat: Dive into swift, strategic battles where every choice matters. Face off against more than 100 unique enemies, each requiring a different strategy to defeat.

- Realistic and Enjoyable Physics: Our game incorporates advanced physics simulations to make spell casting and swordplay feel genuine yet enjoyable, ensuring a natural but challenging experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Valve Index Controllers, Oculus Touch, Vive Wands
  • Additional Notes: 72Hz VR support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 8-16 Core 4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Valve Index Controllers, Oculus Touch, Vive Wands
  • Additional Notes: 72Hz VR support
